dcterms:description: A large-scale figure skating sports video dataset that includes 500 videos, each annotated with scores from nine different referees, focusing on Total Element Score (TES) and Total Program Component Score (PCS).
dcterms:title: FisV dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Pirsiavash
C. Vondrick
Torralba
dcterms:description: A dataset used for assessing the quality of actions, containing videos that are utilized for learning to score figure skating performances.
dcterms:title: MIT-skate

dcterms:creator: Andrej Karpathy
George Toderici
Sanketh Shetty
Thomas Leung
Rahul Sukthankar
Li Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: A large-scale video classification dataset containing over 1 million videos annotated with 487 sports labels, used for training models in video classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Sports-1M

dcterms:creator: Khurram Soomro
Amir Roshan Zamir
Mubarak Shah
dcterms:description: A dataset of 101 human action classes from videos in the wild, used for action recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: UCF 101

dcterms:creator: H. Kuehne
H. Jhuang
E. Garrote
T. Poggio
T. Serre
dcterms:description: A large video database for human motion recognition, containing various actions for recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: HMDB51

dcterms:creator: Yu-Gang Jiang
Zuxuan Wu
Jun Wang
Xiangyang Xue
Shih-Fu Chang
dcterms:description: A dataset that exploits feature and class relationships in video categorization, used for training deep neural networks.
dcterms:title: FCVID

dcterms:creator: Fabian Caba Heilbron
Victor Escorcia
Bernard Ghanem
Juan Carlos Niebles
dcterms:description: A large-scale video benchmark for human activity understanding, containing a diverse set of activities.
dcterms:title: ActivityNet
